name: cuddlefish
text: that is one of my favourite drawings of roast beef.

name: pogo
text: Yes, poppin' the brewski, wearin' the floppy shorts, so much like me in the Midwestern summer.

name: tombsgrave
text:
...And now I've seen every single Achewood strip... again... on Assetbar.

It feels so good.

name: dhinson
text: Fishin for the ol' epiphone sponsorship, eh Onstad??

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Not nearly as hard as he's been fishing for the Rickenbacker sponsorship.

name: woodenteeth
text: What do y'all think Onstad would bust out in his dual-sponsored-guitar-company band? Would love to know.

name: envika
text:
a rickenbacker 325 through an epiphone valve jr. amp

that would be one classy looking combo

name: woodenteeth
text: Woh shit. Hacked. The above comment is not mine. As harmless as it might be... weird.

name: woodenteeth
text: but... you know, I was a different guy 6 months ago. I used y'all in a sentence. How far I have come.

name: empy
text: Man this page ain't got enough comments. I can fit them all on one screen.

name: direhaggis
text: There's something special about this vacation collage. The ultrasound sonogram of his kid, the guitar and amp (as opposed to the evil banjo), stacks of boxes and lists and index cards cataloging Achewood whatnot, what I'd like to imagine is a case of achewater for some madcap hallucinations, and then there's Roast Beef just pensively chilling, slightly worried, doing what Beef does. What it is, Onstad.

name: chewyinside
text:
whoa, RB looks so much more real when he's shaded...seeing the rest of the characters like that would be cool.

or is that look to sentimental for Ray?

name: orvel
text:
Fived because Onstad's unborn child has the first handface pic on Achewood.

If you are going through the strips in order for the first time, you will find handface weekend eventually.
